title: Git: Squash your latests commits into one
description:
With git it’s possible to squash previous commits into one. This is a great way to group certain changes together before sharing them with others. ~ Here’s how to squash some commits into one. Let’s say this is your current git log.
* df71a27 - (HEAD feature_x) Updated CSS for new elements (4 minutes ago) * ba9dd9a - Added new elements to page design (15 minutes ago) * f392171 - Added new feature X (1 day ago) * d7322aa - (origin/feature_x) Proof of concept for feature X (3 days ago) You have a branch feature_x here.
